de.gidoo.owl
Class PrintHTML

java.lang.Object
  de.gidoo.owl.PrintHTML
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.print.Printable
public class PrintHTML
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.print.Printable

Printing of HTML-pages.

This class will ask for the desired PageFormat and then create a new window with this size, add a JEditorPane and print it.

For rendering SyncHTMLEditorKit is used which will render synchronously and wait until everthing is painted (so you don't get empty pages)

Author:
Thomas Krause

print

public int print(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 java.awt.print.PageFormat pageFormat,
                 int pageIndex)
Callback-function to paint on the printer. Will only print the first page. All other pages are refused.

Specified by:
print in interface java.awt.print.Printable
Parameters:
g - the graphics to paint on
pageFormat - the page-format which was choosen
pageIndex - the page-index which shall be printed, printing will only be done when index is zero
